questions.text: Hey, may I have another Guimess?
I've been wondering... does the name Anthony Brown ring a bell with you?
It's really important, I need to know if Jess Brown has been around this bar lately.

answers.text: No, darling, I've never heard that name before.
Okay, darling...  yeah, she’s been around some days.
Anyone who drinks enough Guimess is a regular client, darling.
With a regular client... James Stuart, if I’m not wrong.;All this information needs another beer, darling.
Do you really think I’m that bored, darling? How the hell I am supposed to know that!

questions.text: Can I really trust you when you say that Anthony Brown has never been here? It is very important... have you heard about Jess Brown's crime?

answers.text: What?! Are you being serious, mate?

questions.text: Of course I am. And the first suspect for the case is his husband Anthony. So if you really know something about him…

answers.text: Erm… mate, I didn’t tell you that okay? But… yeah, he’s been playing regularly here. Playing… Poker games. Trust me, he was here last night, alright? He didn’t kill her, come on mate, he was here the whole night.
